text:
In class org.apache.catalina.core.ApplicationContext the method getContext
(String) returns null if you try to get the default context which is named
by an empty string. Is there another way to retrieve the default context??

This is fixed in Tomcat 4.1.20 or later and 5.0.7 or later.
You need to use getContext("/") to retrieve the root context.
